root.name: /* @pjs globalKeyEvents */ directive
root.description: By default sketches loaded using Processing.js will only accept keyboard events when they have focus (i.e. after having tab-navigated to them, or having clicked on them). Using this directive will allow a sketch to receive any keyboard event sent to the page, regardless of whether the canvas it is loaded in has focus or not. Using this directive means that people who visit your page will not need to explicitly click on your sketch to interact with it, but it also means that if you have multiple sketches on a page, any sketch that uses this directive will receive input that may not have been intended for it.
